head.script:
<!-- 
function changePassword(){ window.open("/Produce/WeboaConfig.nsf/modifyPasswordForm?openform","更改密码","width=300,height=230");}function setCookie(cookieName,cvalue,expiredays,path){ var expireDate=new Date(); var expireStr=""; if(expiredays!=null) {  expireDate.setTime(expireDate.getTime()+(expiredays*24*3600*1000));  expireStr="; expires="+expireDate.toGMTString(); } pathStr=(path==null)?"; path=/":"; path="+path; document.cookie=cookieName+'='+escape(cvalue)+expireStr+pathStr;}
// -->

<!-- 
document._domino_target = "_self";
function _doClick(v, o, t, h) {
  var form = document._HomeForm;
  if (form.onsubmit) {
     var retVal = form.onsubmit();
     if (typeof retVal == "boolean" && retVal == false)
       return false;
  }
  var target = document._domino_target;
  if (o.href != null) {
    if (o.target != null)
       target = o.target;
  } else {
    if (t != null)
      target = t;
  }
  form.target = target;
  form.__Click.value = v;
  if (h != null)
    form.action += h;
  form.submit();
  return false;
}
// -->

form.name: _HomeForm
